basics.name: Kevin Jesus Olvera
basics.label: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with over 5 years of expertise in development, automation, virtualization, and networking. Proficient in Python, TypeScript, React, Docker, and OpenStack, with strong skills in SDN and SD-WAN technologies. Recognized for leadership, problem-solving, and dedication to enhancing client satisfaction through innovative solutions. Bilingual in Spanish and English.

work.name: Nokia Operations de México S.A. de C.V.
summary: Led the development and implementation of a platform for virtual network equipment labs, boosting sales and customer engagement across North and Latin America. Oversaw the redesign to improve user experience, integrated OpenStack for lab management, and streamlined deployment with CI/CD pipelines.

Led the development and implementation of a service quality testing system for network equipment using technologies such as Python, Docker and Rest APIs, for the collection of metrics and processing of data for subsequent analysis and delivery of reports to some customers in Latin America.

work.name: Nokia Operations de México S.A. de C.V.
summary: Automated the configuration of equipments of an SD-WAN platform through the use of APIs, generating a reduction in configuration times by up to 40% with the possibility of replicating this automation in future projects.
Designed and implemented prototypes of WEB systems for the management of cost and effort quotes for the different IP products and services offered by the company.
Performed consulting and implementation activities of monitoring solutions for SD-WAN platforms for service providers in Latin America and North America.

education.area: Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS) Fundamentals
Nuage Networks Virtualized Network Services (VNS) Fundamentals

skills_description: Skilled in full-stack development, infrastructure management, and automation. Proficient in building scalable solutions with front-end, back-end, and orchestration technologies, and experienced in deploying and managing virtualized environments with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps tools.
